Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1966...
Injured on 8/22/1966 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 4-5 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by St. Louis in 1972...
Injured on 8/30/1973 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1977, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1977, going 6-0, 0.87...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1980, going 5-0, 1.29...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1981, going 3-1, 1.06...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1981, winning 2 games with a 0.59 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1981, going 6-1, 1.78...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1983, going 4-0, 1.13...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1983, going 24-5, 1.76 ERA...
Traded from St. Louis to Texas on 6/23/1985 (Going to STL: P D. Cone, P M. Williams. Going to TEX: P D. Eckersley)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1986, going 5-0, 0.44...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1987, going 3-1, 1.84...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against Oakland on 9/28/1987, striking out 12...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1987, going 4-0, 1.12...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against New York (A) on 6/22/1989, striking out 9...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
